table.description: Contains up to one row of VAC-1 (VAC-1: Post-enrollment Vaccination) data for each Mouse/Visit combination.
Contains up to one row of APX-1 (APX-1: Abbreviated Physical Exam) data for each Mouse/Visit combination.
Contains up to one row of URF-1 (URF-1: Follow-up Urinalysis (Page 1)) data for each Mouse/Visit combination.
Contains up to one row of LLF-1 (LLF-1: Follow-up Local Lab Results (Page 1)) data for each Mouse/Visit combination.
Contains up to one row of CPF-1 (CPF-1: Follow-up Chemistry Panel) data for each Mouse/Visit combination.
Contains up to one row of OTB-1 (OTB-1: Outside Testing/Belief) data for each Mouse/Visit combination.
Contains up to one row of IV-1 (IV-1:Interim Visit) data for each Mouse/Visit combination.
Contains up to one row of SCL-1 (SCL-1: Specimen Collection) data for each Mouse/Visit combination.
